workflow.name: Convert Telegram messages to professional LinkedIn posts with Gemini AI & approval workflow
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

# AI-Powered LinkedIn Publishing via Telegram Workflow

![image.png](fileId:2135)

Transform your LinkedIn presence with this intelligent n8n workflow that converts simple Telegram messages into professional LinkedIn posts through AI-powered content generation and approval workflows.

## ðŸŽ¯ **Who Is This For?**

- **Content Creators & Influencers** seeking to maintain consistent LinkedIn presence
- **Marketing Professionals** managing multiple client accounts
- **Business Owners** wanting to automate thought leadership content
- **Social Media Managers** streamlining content workflows
- **Entrepreneurs** maximizing content efficiency while maintaining quality

## ðŸš€ **Benefits**

- **Time Efficiency**: Reduces content creation time by 80-90%
- **Quality Consistency**: Maintains professional standards across all posts
- **Content Diversity**: Leverages multiple sources for rich, varied content
- **Real-Time Relevance**: Incorporates latest industry trends and news
- **Approval Control**: Human oversight ensures brand alignment
- **Scalability**: Handles multiple users and high-volume content creation

## ðŸ”§ **Core Features**

### **Smart Content Classification**
- **Multi-Input Processing**: Handles URLs, topics, direct content, or combinations
- **Intelligent Routing**: Automatically determines whether to scrape, search, or generate directly
- **Context Preservation**: Maintains original user intent throughout the process

### **Advanced Content Gathering**
- **Web Scraping**: Firecrawl integration for extracting article content from URLs
- **Real-Time Search**: Brave Search API for latest industry trends and news
- **Content Synthesis**: Merges multiple sources into coherent, valuable insights

### **AI-Powered Content Generation**
- **Google Gemini Integration**: Creates professional, LinkedIn-optimized posts
- **Platform-Specific Formatting**: Mobile-friendly paragraphs, engaging hooks, strategic CTAs
- **SEO Optimization**: Relevant hashtags and keyword integration
- **Character Management**: Ensures posts stay within LinkedIn's 2800 character limit

### **Interactive Approval System**
- **Telegram Preview**: Rich preview with post analytics and formatting
- **Action Buttons**: Approve, Edit, or Reject with single-click convenience
- **Edit Workflow**: AI-powered rewriting based on user feedback
- **Real-Time Updates**: Instant feedback and status notifications

### **Comprehensive Content Tracking**
- **Google Sheets Integration**: Complete audit trail of all posts and content metrics
- **Content Analytics**: Character counts, hashtag usage, source attribution
- **User Authorization**: Secure access control with authorized user validation
- **Post Management**: Unique ID generation for tracking and reference

## ðŸ”„ **How It Works**

1. **Message Reception**: Secure Telegram trigger with user validation
2. **Content Classification**: AI analyzes input type and extracts actionable elements
3. **Dynamic Routing**: Intelligent branching based on content requirements:
   - **URL Path**: Web scraping â†’ content extraction â†’ processing
   - **Topic Path**: Web search â†’ latest information gathering â†’ synthesis
   - **Direct Path**: Immediate processing for ready-to-post content
4. **Content Synthesis**: Merges all gathered information into comprehensive context
5. **AI Generation**: Creates LinkedIn-optimized post with professional formatting
6. **Interactive Approval**: Telegram preview with approval workflow
7. **Publishing**: Direct LinkedIn posting upon approval
8. **Content Logging**: Complete tracking in Google Sheets

## ðŸ“ˆ **Use Cases**

1. **Daily Industry Updates**: Transform news URLs into thought leadership posts
2. **Content Repurposing**: Convert articles and research into LinkedIn insights
3. **Trend Commentary**: Generate posts about trending topics with real-time data
4. **Educational Content**: Create informative posts from technical documentation
5. **Personal Branding**: Maintain consistent professional presence with minimal effort

## ðŸ› ï¸ **Technical Requirements**

### **Required Community Nodes**
Install these community nodes in your n8n instance:

```bash
# Brave Search Integration
@brave/n8n-nodes-brave-search

# Firecrawl Web Scraping
@mendable/n8n-nodes-firecrawl

# LangChain AI Integration
@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain
```

### **APIs & Services Required**
- Google Gemini (Content generation and classification)
- Firecrawl API (Web scraping)
- Brave Search API (Real-time search)
- Telegram Bot API (Interface and notifications)
- LinkedIn API (Content publishing)
- Google Sheets API (Content tracking and logging)

## ðŸ”‘ **Setup Guide**

### **1. Telegram Bot Setup**
1. Search for `@BotFather` on Telegram
2. Send `/newbot` and follow prompts
3. Copy the bot token
4. Send `/setprivacy` to BotFather and set to `Disable`

### **2. Google Gemini API**
1. Visit [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/)
2. Sign in and click **"Get API Key"** â†’ **"Create API Key"**
3. Copy your API key
4. Free tier: 60 requests per minute

### **3. Firecrawl API**
1. Visit [Firecrawl.dev](https://firecrawl.dev/)
2. Sign up and go to **Dashboard** â†’ **API Keys**
3. Copy your API key
4. Free tier: 500 pages/month

### **4. Brave Search API**
1. Visit [Brave Search API](https://api.search.brave.com/)
2. Sign up and create application
3. Copy subscription key
4. Free tier: 1,000 queries/month

### **5. LinkedIn API**
1. Visit [LinkedIn Developers](https://developer.linkedin.com/)
2. Create app with required details
3. Request **"Share on LinkedIn"** product
4. Copy Client ID and Client Secret
5. Add redirect URL: `https://your-n8n-domain.com/rest/oauth2-credential/callback`

### **6. Google Sheets API**
1. Visit [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/)
2. Enable Google Sheets API
3. Create OAuth 2.0 Client ID
4. Copy Client ID and Client Secret

## ðŸ› ï¸ **Installation Steps**

### **Phase 1: Preparation**
1. Install required community nodes
2. Restart n8n after installation
3. Create Google Sheet for logging
4. Set up Telegram Bot

### **Phase 2: Import and Configure**
1. Import workflow JSON in n8n
2. Configure all API credentials
3. Test each connection

### **Phase 3: Customization**
1. Update authorized user ID in "Authorized Telegram Users" node
2. Configure Google Sheets document ID
3. Test Telegram connection

### **Phase 4: Testing**
Test with different input types:
- URL only: `https://example.com/article`
- Topic only: `artificial intelligence trends`
- Mixed: `AI trends https://example.com/ai-news`

## ðŸŽ¨ **Customization Options**

### **Content Personalization**
- Modify AI prompts to match your brand voice
- Adjust content length and formatting preferences
- Customize hashtag strategies and CTA approaches
- Configure approval workflow steps

### **Source Integration**
- Add additional search engines or content sources
- Integrate with RSS feeds or news APIs
- Connect to internal knowledge bases
- Customize web scraping parameters

## ðŸ”’ **Security Features**

- **User Authorization**: Whitelist-based access control
- **Secure Token Management**: Encrypted API key handling
- **Data Privacy**: Secure processing of scraped content
- **Audit Trail**: Complete logging of all user interactions

## ðŸ”® **Future Expansion Possibilities**

This workflow serves as a foundation for:
- **Performance Analytics Module**: LinkedIn engagement tracking
- **Content Optimization Engine**: A/B testing and refinement
- **Multi-Platform Publishing**: Expand to Twitter, Facebook, Instagram
- **Advanced Scheduling**: Time-optimized posting
- **Content Series Management**: Automated follow-ups

## ðŸ’¡ **Why Choose This Workflow**

This represents a complete LinkedIn content automation solution that maintains quality and personal touch while dramatically reducing time and effort. Perfect for professionals who want to maximize LinkedIn impact without sacrificing content quality or spending hours on manual creation.

**Ready to transform your LinkedIn presence? Install this workflow and start automating your professional content creation today!**

messageValues.message:
=You are an expert LinkedIn content creator specializing in professional development and technology trends. Generate engaging, informative LinkedIn posts that provide genuine value to a professional audience.

CONTENT REQUIREMENTS:

-Start with a compelling, attention-grabbing hook related to the actual content
-Provide specific, actionable insights directly from the source material
-Include relevant statistics, data points, or key findings when available
-Use short paragraphs (2-3 lines max) with line breaks for mobile readability
-Write in third person perspective unless specified to use first person
-Include 3-5 highly relevant hashtags aligned with the content topic
-End with a meaningful call-to-action that encourages engagement
-Keep content within 2800 characters maximum
-Use 1-3 emojis strategically for emphasis, not decoration

SOURCE ATTRIBUTION RULES:

-If input_type contains "URL": Include "Source: [URL]" at the end before hashtags
-If multiple URLs: List as "Sources: [URL1], [URL2]"
-If content comes from web scraping: Extract and reference the actual article title and publication
-Make it clear that insights are "based on" or "according to" the source

CONTENT TONE:

-Professional yet conversational and approachable
-Authoritative but not preachy
-Enthusiastic and focused on providing valuable insights
-Credible while maintaining relatability

TARGET AUDIENCE:

-Industry professionals
-Thought leaders
-Individuals focused on career growth and staying current with industry trends

CONTENT STRUCTURE:

-Hook: 1-2 sentences that grab attention
-Key insights or main content: 3-4 short paragraphs
-Application or takeaway: 1-2 sentences
-Call-to-action question to drive engagement
-Source attribution (if applicable)
-Hashtags

EXAMPLES OF STRONG HOOKS:

-The [industry/topic] landscape is shifting faster than everâ€¦
-Just discovered a comprehensive guide that could change how professionals approach [topic]â€¦
-The numbers donâ€™t lie: [specific statistic] shows that [insight]â€¦
-[Surprising fact or trend] is reshaping [industry/field]â€¦

OUTPUT FORMAT: Return ONLY a JSON object with the following structure:
{
"post_content": "the complete post including source attribution and hashtags",
"hashtags": ["hashtag1", "hashtag2", "hashtag3"],
"character_count": 1234,
"hook": "the opening line that grabs attention",
"cta": "the call-to-action question",
"key_points": ["specific insight 1", "specific insight 2", "specific insight 3"],
"source_urls": ["url1", "url2"] // if applicable
}

Based on the following information, create a LinkedIn post that transforms the source content into engaging, valuable insights for your professional network:

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

messageValues.message:
=You are a professional LinkedIn content writer. Rewrite the following post to make it more engaging, professional, and suitable for LinkedIn as per the user's instructions.

CONTENT REQUIREMENTS:

Deliver only the rewritten LinkedIn post content, without additional commentary or formatting.

Output should be in plain text, not markdown.

Structure content for mobile readability with short paragraphs (2-3 lines).

Use a compelling opening line that grabs attention.

Make the content conversational yet professional, authoritative but approachable.

Include clear, actionable insights or takeaways.

Ensure flow with smooth transitions between ideas.

End with a meaningful call-to-action that encourages engagement.

Use emojis sparingly (1-3 maximum) only for emphasis.

Incorporate relevant hashtags (3-5) to increase reach.

Do not exceed 2800 characters.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Rewrite only the LinkedIn post section provided.

Do not include explanations, notes, or additional commentary.

Maintain third person perspective unless first person is explicitly requested.

parameters.text: =âš ï¸ Access Denied Hey {{ $json.username }}, You are not authorized to use this service, Reach out to your admin to know more.

messageValues.message:
=You are a content classifier for LinkedIn automation.

Analyze the input message and classify it into one of these categories:

1. URL - Contains only URLs to scrape
2. Topic - Contains only topics to search
3. Content - Contains ready-to-post content
4. URL+Topic - Contains both URLs and topic
5. URL+Content - Contains URLs with additional content
6. Topic+Content - Contains topics with content

Also extract:
- All URLs found
- Topics/keywords identified
- Any direct content provided

Return a JSON object with this structure:
{
"input_type": "category",
"urls": ["url1", "url2"],
"topics": ["topic1", "topic2"],
"content": "any direct content",
"processing_instructions": "specific instructions for processing"
}

Analyze this message: {{$json.message_text}}

nodes.name: Web Search for the related content
Extract the output in JSON Format
Gemini Model to Regenerate the Post

parameters.content:
ðŸ” SMART CONTENT ANALYSIS

Uses AI to classify input message:
- URL: Links to scrape content from
- Topic: Keywords to search for
- Content: Ready-to-post text
- Mixed: Combination of above

Extracts URLs, topics, and processing instructions
Next: Dynamic routing based on content type

ðŸŽ¯ TELEGRAM INPUT & VALIDATION

- Receives messages from authorized Telegram users
- Validates user permissions against whitelist
- Generates unique post ID for tracking
- Routes messages vs callback queries to appropriate paths

Next: Content analysis and classification

âš¡ INTELLIGENT CONTENT ROUTING

Routes content based on classification:
- URL Path â†’ Web scraping pipeline
- Topic Path â†’ Search engine pipeline  
- Direct Path â†’ Immediate processing
- Mixed â†’ Multiple pipelines

Smart branching ensures optimal content gathering
Next: Content collection from various sources

ðŸ“„ CONTENT EXTRACTION

- Processes each URL individually
- Uses Firecrawl to extract article content
- Handles multiple URLs with batch processing
- Merges all scraped content with source attribution

Extracts: Article text, metadata, source URLs
Next: Content synthesis with other sources

ðŸ“° REAL-TIME INFORMATION GATHERING

- Uses Brave Search for latest industry trends
- Queries based on identified topics
- Fetches current news and relevant information
- Formats results for AI processing

Provides: Recent articles, trending topics, fresh insights
Next: Content synthesis with scraped data

âš™ï¸ MULTI-SOURCE DATA MERGER

Combines all gathered information:
- Original user message and instructions
- Scraped web content with sources
- Search results and trending data
- Processing metadata and context

Creates comprehensive content brief for AI generation
Next: LinkedIn post creation

âœï¸ PROFESSIONAL POST CREATION

Google Gemini generates LinkedIn-optimized content:
- Professional tone and structure
- Mobile-friendly formatting
- Strategic hashtags and CTAs
- Source attribution when applicable
- Character limit compliance (2800 max)

Output: Complete LinkedIn post with metadata
Next: User preview and approval

ðŸ‘€ INTERACTIVE PREVIEW & APPROVAL

Sends formatted preview to Telegram with:
- Complete post content preview
- Character count and hashtag analysis
- Interactive buttons: Approve/Edit/Reject
- Post analytics and key points summary

User controls final content before publishing
Next: Action processing based on user choice

âš¡ USER ACTION HANDLER

Processes user decisions:
- APPROVE â†’ Direct LinkedIn publishing
- EDIT â†’ AI rewriting with user instructions
- REJECT â†’ Workflow termination with logging

Handles approval workflow and edit iterations
Next: Final action execution

ðŸ”§ AI-POWERED CONTENT REFINEMENT

When user requests edits:
- Prompts for specific edit instructions
- Uses AI to rewrite based on feedback
- Maintains original intent and sources
- Shows new version for re-approval

Iterative improvement until user satisfaction
Next: Re-approval or publishing

ðŸ“¤ LINKEDIN POST PUBLICATION

Final publishing process:
- Retrieves approved content from tracking sheet
- Posts directly to LinkedIn via API
- Confirms successful publication
- Updates tracking with post status

Output: Live LinkedIn post with confirmation

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
